title: Covid-19 Ready Winery/Distillery* Tour
timeLong:
10:30 am start time

4:00 pm end time
priceLong:
1-2 guests-$300

3-4 guests-$400

5-8 guests-$500

9-12 guests-$800

Call or email to book the tour or if you have any questions.
body:
We are happy to announce our COVID19 ready Winery/Distillery* Tour! We are following strict cleanliness guidelines and will arrive to pick up your party in a fully sanitized vehicle with extra wipes, hand sanitizer, and gloves for all.  

This tour will pick you up in Santa Barbara and take you to three unique venues in the Santa Ynez Valley as well as a working olive oil farm. Guests are responsible for the purchase of alcohol and food, and to bring along their own masks.

\*Choose either one distillery and two winery visits or three winery visits.
